item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Yash Lala. I’m a third-year CS undergraduate student at UCLA. My interests include parallel computation, distributed system design, and climbing. This page is still under construction (as of 2020-12-02). I’ve just migrated from my “handmade” original site to this hugo based setup. I haven’t customized the site to my liking yet, though; there may be some rough edges. Please forgive any gaudy colors or styling. If you have feedback or just want to chat, feel free to contact me via the links at the bottom of the page!
